div.p: This code system http://www.fhir.org/guides/omhtofhir/CodeSystem/omh-temporal-relationship-to-meal defines the following codes:

tr.td: The relative time 2 hours following a meal

title.value: Omh Temporal Relationship To Meal Code System

description.value: OMH datapoint schema type representing the measure of an Open mHealth data schema. These concepts are used were suitable LOINC or SNOMED-CT concepts are not available.

definition.value: The relative time 2 hours following a meal
